title: 13.5.2 Application metrics with CloudWatch Metrics
body:
# Objective
Implement comprehensive application metrics for monitoring performance, business KPIs, and system health.

## Requirements
- Define custom metrics for business logic
- Implement metrics for API endpoints
- Track resource utilization metrics
- Monitor background job metrics
- Set up SLI/SLO metrics
- Create CloudWatch dashboards
- Implement metrics aggregation
- Configure metric alarms
- Add metrics for cost optimization
- Track user activity metrics
- Document metrics catalog

## Acceptance Criteria
- Custom metrics published to CloudWatch
- API metrics tracking request rate, latency, errors
- Business metrics (scans, recommendations, savings)
- SLI/SLO metrics defined and tracked
- CloudWatch dashboards created
- Alarms configured for critical metrics
- Metrics documentation maintained
- Historical data available for analysis

## Dependencies
- Parent: Epic 13 (#131)
- Requires: #165 (Structured logging)
- Related: #146 (CloudWatch monitoring)

## Estimated Effort
**Story Points:** 8
**Time:** 1.5 weeks
**Complexity:** Medium
